variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp
dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions

dependent_to.name: py-arviz
dependent_to.description:
ArviZ (pronounced "AR-vees") is a Python package for exploratory
analysis of Bayesian models. Includes functions for posterior analysis,
model checking, comparison and diagnostics.

dependent_to.name: py-pyerfa
dependent_to.description:
PyERFA is the Python wrapper for the ERFA library (Essential Routines
for Fundamental Astronomy), a C library containing key algorithms for
astronomy, which is based on the SOFA library published by the
International Astronomical Union (IAU). All C routines are wrapped as
Numpy universal functions, so that they can be called with scalar or
array inputs.

dependent_to.name: py-mkdocs
dependent_to.description:
MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator
that's geared towards building project documentation.

dependent_to.name: py-fastai
dependent_to.description:
You can use fastai without any installation by using Google Colab. In
fact, every page of this documentation is also available as an
interactive notebook - click "Open in colab" at the top of any page to
open it (be sure to change the Colab runtime to "GPU" to have it run
fast!) See the fast.ai documentation on Using Colab for more
information.

dependent_to.name: py-jupytext
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebooks as Markdown Documents, Julia, Python or R scripts

dependent_to.name: py-numexpr
dependent_to.description: Fast numerical expression evaluator for NumPy

dependent_to.name: py-dcm2bids
dependent_to.description:
Reorganising NIfTI files from dcm2niix into the Brain Imaging Data
Structure.

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab
dependent_to.description:
JupyterLab is the next-generation web-based user interface for Project
Jupyter.

dependent_to.name: py-pint
dependent_to.description:
Pint is a Python package to define, operate and manipulate physical
quantities: the product of a numerical value and a unit of measurement.
It allows arithmetic operations between them and conversions from and to
different units.

dependent_to.name: py-ipykernel
dependent_to.description: IPython Kernel for Jupyter

dependent_to.name: py-glymur
dependent_to.description:
glymur contains a Python interface to the OpenJPEG library which allows
one to read and write JPEG 2000 files. glymur works on Python 3.7, 3.8,
3.9, and 3.10.

dependent_to.name: py-galaxy-util
dependent_to.description: Galaxy Generic Utilities

dependent_to.name: py-pyside2
dependent_to.description: Python bindings for Qt.

dependent_to.name: py-cmocean
dependent_to.description: Colormaps for Oceanography.

dependent_to.name: py-cwl-utils
dependent_to.description:
Python Utilities and Autogenerated Classes for loading and parsing CWL
v1.0, CWL v1.1, and CWL v1.2 documents.

dependent_to.name: py-matplotlib
dependent_to.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-torchmetrics
dependent_to.description: Machine learning metrics for distributed, scalable PyTorch applications.

dependent_to.name: py-accelerate
dependent_to.description:
A simple way to train and use PyTorch models with multi-GPU, TPU, mixed-
precision.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependent_to.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-cartopy
dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.

dependent_to.name: py-neo
dependent_to.description:
Neo is a package for representing electrophysiology data in Python,
together with support for reading a wide range of neurophysiology file
formats

dependent_to.name: py-fortls
dependent_to.description:
A Language Server for Fortran providing code completion, diagnostics,
hovering and more.

dependent_to.name: py-dunamai
dependent_to.description: Dynamic version generation.

dependent_to.name: py-pydata-sphinx-theme
dependent_to.description:
A clean, three-column, Bootstrap-based Sphinx theme by and for the
PyData community.

dependent_to.name: py-colossalai
dependent_to.description:
An integrated large-scale model training system with efficient
parallelization techniques.

dependent_to.name: py-ipyparallel
dependent_to.description: IPython's architecture for parallel and distributed computing.

dependent_to.name: py-statsmodels
dependent_to.description: Statistical computations and models for use with SciPy

dependent_to.name: py-dist-meta
dependent_to.description: Parse and create Python distribution metadata.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-utilities
dependent_to.description: Common Python utilities and GitHub Actions in Lightning Ecosystem

dependent_to.name: py-plotly
dependent_to.description: An interactive, browser-based graphing library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-anndata
dependent_to.description:
anndata is a Python package for handling annotated data matrices in
memory and on disk, positioned between pandas and xarray.

dependent_to.name: py-dvc
dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependent_to.name: py-whey
dependent_to.description: A simple Python wheel builder for simple projects.

dependent_to.name: n2p2
dependent_to.description:
N2p2 (The neural network potential package) provides ready-to-use
software for high-dimensional neural network potentials in computational
physics and chemistry.

dependent_to.name: py-hatchling
dependent_to.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.

dependent_to.name: py-huggingface-hub
dependent_to.description:
This library allows anyone to work with the Hub repositories: you can
clone them, create them and upload your models to them.

dependent_to.name: py-vector
dependent_to.description: Vector classes and utilities

dependent_to.name: py-pooch
dependent_to.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.

dependent_to.name: py-nilearn
dependent_to.description: Statistical learning for neuroimaging in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-qutip
dependent_to.description: QuTiP: The Quantum Toolbox in Python

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-doctestplus
dependent_to.description: Pytest plugin with advanced doctest features.

dependent_to.name: py-cekit
dependent_to.description:
CEKit is a Container image creation tool. CEKit helps to build container
images from image definition files with strong focus on modularity and
code reuse.

dependent_to.name: py-fastcore
dependent_to.description:
Python is a powerful, dynamic language. Rather than bake everything into
the language, it lets the programmer customize it to make it work for
them. fastcore uses this flexibility to add to Python features inspired
by other languages we've loved, like multiple dispatch from Julia,
mixins from Ruby, and currying, binding, and more from Haskell. It also
adds some "missing features" and clean up some rough edges in the Python
standard library, such as simplifying parallel processing, and bringing
ideas from NumPy over to Python's list type.

dependent_to.name: py-apispec
dependent_to.description: A pluggable API specification generator.

dependent_to.name: py-radical-entk
dependent_to.description:
RADICAL Ensemble Toolkit is used for developing and executing large-
scale ensemble-based workflows.

dependent_to.name: py-astropy
dependent_to.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pyzmq
dependent_to.description: PyZMQ: Python bindings for zeromq.

dependent_to.name: py-deephyper
dependent_to.description:
Scalable asynchronous neural architecture and hyperparameter search for
deep neural networks.

dependent_to.name: py-webargs
dependent_to.description:
Python library for parsing and validating HTTP request objects, with
built-in support for popular web frameworks, including Flask, Django,
Bottle, Tornado, Pyramid, Falcon, and aiohttp.

dependent_to.name: py-mne
dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-dipy
dependent_to.description:
Diffusion MRI utilities in python. DIPY is the paragon 3D/4D+ imaging
library in Python. Contains generic methods for spatial normalization,
signal processing, machine learning, statistical analysis and
visualization of medical images. Additionally, it contains specialized
methods for computational anatomy including diffusion, perfusion and
structural imaging.

dependent_to.name: py-mariadb
dependent_to.description: A module for connecting to mariaDB databases

dependent_to.name: py-lightning
dependent_to.description: The deep learning framework to pretrain, finetune and deploy AI models.

dependent_to.name: neuron
dependent_to.description:
NEURON is a simulation environment for single and networks of neurons.
NEURON is a simulation environment for modeling individual and networks
of neurons. NEURON models individual neurons via the use of sections
that are automatically subdivided into individual compartments, instead
of requiring the user to manually create compartments.

dependent_to.name: py-kornia
dependent_to.description: Open Source Differentiable Computer Vision Library for PyTorch.

dependent_to.name: py-librosa
dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.

dependent_to.name: py-petastorm
dependent_to.description:
Petastorm is a library enabling the use of Parquet storage from
Tensorflow, Pytorch, and other Python-based ML training frameworks.

dependent_to.name: py-build
dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx
dependent_to.description: Sphinx Documentation Generator.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-gmxapi
dependent_to.description:
Python bindings and ensemble workflow management for GROMACS. The
GROMACS C++ API is affected by its package variants. You can specify a
particular GROMACS API by making the dependency variant explicit. E.g.
``spack install gmxapi ^gromacs+mpi~double``

dependent_to.name: py-docker
dependent_to.description: A Python library for the Docker Engine API.

dependent_to.name: py-hepdata-validator
dependent_to.description: Validation schema and code for HEPdata submissions.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-ont-fast5-api
dependent_to.description:
This project provides classes and utility functions for working with
read fast5 files. It provides an abstraction layer between the
underlying h5py library and the various concepts central to read fast5
files, such as "reads", "analyses", "analysis summaries", and "analysis
datasets". Ideally all interaction with a read fast5 file should be
possible via this API, without having to directly invoke the h5py
library.

dependent_to.name: py-onnxruntime
dependent_to.description:
ONNX Runtime is a performance-focused complete scoring engine for Open
Neural Network Exchange (ONNX) models, with an open extensible
architecture to continually address the latest developments in AI and
Deep Learning. ONNX Runtime stays up to date with the ONNX standard with
complete implementation of all ONNX operators, and supports all ONNX
releases (1.2+) with both future and backwards compatibility.

dependent_to.name: py-mdanalysis
dependent_to.description:
MDAnalysis is a Python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics
trajectories generated by a wide range of popular simulation packages
including DL_Poly, CHARMM, Amber, NAMD, LAMMPS, and Gromacs. (See the
lists of supported trajectory formats and topology formats.)

dependent_to.name: py-deprecation-alias
dependent_to.description: Wrapper providing support for deprecated aliases.

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-superqt
dependent_to.description: Missing widgets and components for PyQt/PySide

dependent_to.name: py-bleach
dependent_to.description: An easy whitelist-based HTML-sanitizing tool.

dependent_to.name: py-grayskull
dependent_to.description: Project to generate recipes for conda packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pyqt-builder
dependent_to.description: The PEP 517 compliant PyQt build system.

dependent_to.name: py-shap
dependent_to.description:
SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlanations): a unified approach to explain the
output of any machine learning model.

dependent_to.name: py-asdf
dependent_to.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build
dependent_to.description:
scikit-build is an improved build system generator for CPython
C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It provides better support for
additional compilers, build systems, cross compilation, and locating
dependencies and their associated build requirements. The scikit-build
package is fundamentally just glue between the setuptools Python module
and CMake.

dependent_to.name: nf-core-tools
dependent_to.description: A python package with helper tools for the nf-core community.

dependent_to.name: py-mplhep
dependent_to.description: Matplotlib styles for HEP

dependent_to.name: py-geopandas
dependent_to.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-git-versioning
dependent_to.description: Use git repo data for building a version number according PEP-440

dependent_to.name: py-awkward
dependent_to.description: Manipulate JSON-like data with NumPy-like idioms.

dependent_to.name: py-streamlit
dependent_to.description: The fastest way to build data apps in Python.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad
dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.

dependent_to.name: py-uproot
dependent_to.description:
ROOT I/O in pure Python and NumPy. Uproot is a reader and a writer of
the ROOT file format using only Python and Numpy. Unlike the standard
C++ ROOT implementation, Uproot is only an I/O library, primarily
intended to stream data into machine learning libraries in Python.
Unlike PyROOT and root_numpy, Uproot does not depend on C++ ROOT.
Instead, it uses Numpy to cast blocks of data from the ROOT file as
Numpy arrays.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-theme-builder
dependent_to.description: A tool for authoring Sphinx themes with a simple (opinionated) workflow.

dependent_to.name: py-ansible
dependent_to.description:
Ansible is a radically simple IT automation platform that makes your
applications and systems easier to deploy.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-fabric
dependent_to.description:
Fabric is the fast and lightweight way to scale PyTorch models without
boilerplate.

dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow
dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an open source machine learning framework for everyone.

dependent_to.name: py-argparse-manpage
dependent_to.description: Build manual page from python's ArgumentParser object.

dependent_to.name: py-ctgan
dependent_to.description:
CTGAN is a collection of Deep Learning based Synthetic Data Generators
for single table data, which are able to learn from real data and
generate synthetic clones with high fidelity.

dependent_to.name: py-dask
dependent_to.description: Dask is a flexible parallel computing library for analytics.

dependent_to.name: mongodb
dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.

dependent_to.name: py-optuna
dependent_to.description:
Optuna is an automatic hyperparameter optimization software framework,
particularly designed for machine learning. It features an imperative,
define-by-run style user API. Thanks to our define-by-run API, the code
written with Optuna enjoys high modularity, and the user of Optuna can
dynamically construct the search spaces for the hyperparameters.

dependent_to.name: pipx
dependent_to.description:
pipx is a tool to install and run Python applications in isolated
environments

dependent_to.name: py-distributed
dependent_to.description: Distributed scheduler for Dask

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependent_to.name: py-pytorch-lightning
dependent_to.description: PyTorch Lightning is the lightweight PyTorch wrapper for ML researchers.

dependent_to.name: py-nibabel
dependent_to.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats

dependent_to.name: py-modin
dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.

dependent_to.name: py-skl2onnx
dependent_to.description: Convert scikit-learn models to ONNX

dependent_to.name: py-seriate
dependent_to.description:
This is a Python implementation of Seriation algorithm. Seriation is an
approach for ordering elements in a set so that the sum of the
sequential pairwise distances is minimal. We state this task as a
Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP) and leverage the powerful Google's or-
tools to do heavy-lifting. Since TSP is NP-hard, it is not possible to
calculate the precise solution for a big number of elements. However,
the or-tools' heuristics work very well in practice, and they are used
in e.g. Google Maps.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest
dependent_to.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-qutip-qip
dependent_to.description: The QuTiP quantum information processing package

dependent_to.name: py-sip
dependent_to.description: A Python bindings generator for C/C++ libraries.

dependent_to.name: py-scanpy
dependent_to.description:
Scanpy is a scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression
data built jointly with anndata.

dependent_to.name: py-panel
dependent_to.description: A high level app and dashboarding solution for Python.

dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-metadata
dependent_to.description: PEP 621 metadata parsing.

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)

dependent_to.name: py-marshmallow
dependent_to.description:
marshmallow is an ORM/ODM/framework-agnostic library for converting
complex datatypes, such as objects, to and from native Python datatypes.

dependent_to.name: py-rst2pdf
dependent_to.description:
Convert reStructured Text to PDF via ReportLab. The usual way of
creating PDF from reStructuredText is by going through LaTeX. This tool
provides an alternative by producing PDF directly using the ReportLab
library.

dependent_to.name: py-altair
dependent_to.description: Declarative statistical visualization library for Python

dependent_to.name: py-xarray
dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python

dependent_to.name: py-nipype
dependent_to.description: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces.

dependent_to.name: py-pyshacl
dependent_to.description: A Python validator for SHACL.

dependent_to.name: py-transformers
dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch

dependent_to.name: py-tables
dependent_to.description:
PyTables is a package for managing hierarchical datasets and designed to
efficiently and easily cope with extremely large amounts of data.

dependent_to.name: py-nbconvert
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook Conversion

dependent_to.name: py-bokeh
dependent_to.description: Statistical and novel interactive HTML plots for Python

dependent_to.name: py-datasets
dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.

dependent_to.name: py-h5netcdf
dependent_to.description:
A Python interface for the netCDF4 file-format that reads and writes
local or remote HDF5 files directly via h5py or h5pyd, without relying
on the Unidata netCDF library.

dependent_to.name: py-yt
dependent_to.description:
Volumetric Data Analysis yt is a python package for analyzing and
visualizing volumetric, multi-resolution data from astrophysical
simulations, radio telescopes, and a burgeoning interdisciplinary
community.

dependent_to.name: py-pytest-remotedata
dependent_to.description: Pytest plugin for controlling remote data access.

dependent_to.name: py-hatch-requirements-txt
dependent_to.description: Hatchling plugin to read project dependencies from requirements.txt

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-packaging
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Packaging Utilities.

dependent_to.name: snakemake
dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyterlab-server
dependent_to.description:
A set of server components for JupyterLab and JupyterLab like
applications

dependent_to.name: py-deprecation
dependent_to.description:
The deprecation library provides a deprecated decorator and a
fail_if_not_removed decorator for your tests.

dependent_to.name: py-oslo-utils
dependent_to.description:
The oslo.utils library provides support for common utility type
functions, such as encoding, exception handling, string manipulation,
and time handling.

dependent_to.name: py-mlflow
dependent_to.description: MLflow: A Platform for ML Development and Productionization.

dependent_to.name: py-deepspeed
dependent_to.description:
DeepSpeed library. DeepSpeed enables world's most powerful language
models like MT-530B and BLOOM. It is an easy-to-use deep learning
optimization software suite that powers unprecedented scale and speed
for both training and inference.

dependent_to.name: py-hydra-core
dependent_to.description: A framework for elegantly configuring complex applications.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-ml
dependent_to.description: Scalable Machine Learning with Dask.

dependent_to.name: py-gradio-client
dependent_to.description:
Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning
models

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image
dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.

dependent_to.name: py-scikit-build-core
dependent_to.description:
scikit-build-core is a doubly improved build system generator for
CPython C/C++/Fortran/Cython extensions. It features several
improvements over the classic scikit-build build system generator.

dependent_to.name: py-pyprecice
dependent_to.description:
This package provides python language bindings for the C++ library
preCICE.

dependent_to.name: py-tox
dependent_to.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.

dependent_to.name: py-pyproject-parser
dependent_to.description: Parser for 'pyproject.toml'

dependent_to.name: py-tensorboardx
dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this package is to let researchers use a simple interface
to log events within PyTorch (and then show visualization in
tensorboard). This package currently supports logging scalar, image,
audio, histogram, text, embedding, and the route of back-propagation.

dependent_to.name: py-shippinglabel
dependent_to.description: Utilities for handling packages.

dependent_to.name: py-lightning-lite
dependent_to.description:
LightningLite enables pure PyTorch users to scale their existing code on
any kind of device while retaining full control over their own loops and
optimization logic.
